name: EXPLORE PHONG NHA IN 4,5KM DEPTH - 1 DAY TOUR
description: You will become professional adventurers to explore the mysterious underground river and impressive beauty of Phong Nha cave with kayak, dragon boat or piragua, flashlights and other specialized equipment.A new experience on the longest underground river in the world will provide you with an unforgettable experience. Joining this unique tour, you will be felt and experienced full 7 outstanding global criteria of Phong Nha cave.
